item.description:
Hey folks, I'm changing the day of my intended RPG meetup. Weekends are easier for me to organize. So if you could please all respond, email me or just RSVP. I will appreciate it.

Hope to see you there!

Just trying to get togehter a feew peple, DM's and character players alike. Pitch some ideas, get to know each other a little more.
item.name: Providence Dungeons & Dragons November Meetup
